entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2 except plus 2 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2 except plus 2 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along the Strait.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along the Strait. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
